io.netty.handler.ssl.util

Packages that use io.netty.handler.ssl.util
Package
Description
io.netty.handler.ssl.util
Utility classes that helps easier development of TLS/SSL applications.
  • Classes in io.netty.handler.ssl.util used by io.netty.handler.ssl.util

    Description
    FingerprintTrustManagerFactory
    An TrustManagerFactory that trusts an X.509 certificate whose hash matches.

    A builder for creating FingerprintTrustManagerFactory.
